review: The Preset Keyboard and Mouse controlls are rubbish so a controller is necissary.I can't distinguish the colors to do the executions, which appears to be central to the gameplay.I have to find something else to do today. What a dissapointment.
Great StoryAppropriately Gloomy Art DesignAmazing Voice ActingAnd Puzzles That Require 'Outside The Box' Thinking To SolveAn Overall Fantastic Way To Spend An Afternoon.
